entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
